name: An Age Of Extinction - 8Bit War
description:
Your mission: Protect earth from extinction and survive!

They came without notice, to destroy our planet. These alien enemies have powers to send the mooN, other planets and asteroids hurtling towards Earth, determined to destroy it. Help to defend Earth by using the repelling shots of your ship. You don’t want to destroy the moon after all, so you just have to repel it to prevent it from crashing into Earth.

Look out for the special absorber power up. Good luck soldier!


*Game Center Leaderboard
*Pixel Graphics
*MultiTouch
*Addictive Gameplay
*Very Easy to Learn
*Very Challenging to get the high score

Age Of Extinction is a mix of Planetary Defense and Physics. This game is a great time killer and intense fun all in one.

Simply touch the screen for a rapid fire or touch with a second finger to fire a larger shot to help with the larger enemy Alpha Balls. Survive as long as you can and dominate the Worldwide Leader-board.
